items.content_html: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.
items.title: mini-360/LinkShortner: Link Shortener is a lightweight and efficient URL shortening service designed to condense long, cumbersome URLs into short, easy-to-share links. This service is ideal for social media, email campaigns, or any platform where space is at a premium. With a simple, user-friendly interface and robust backend.

items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!

items.content_html: [IN-PROGRESS] nestjs-rivulex is a NestJS transport layer and wrapper for Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It ensures reliable, at-least-once message delivery within NestJS applications.
items.title: raw-leak/nestjs-rivulex: [IN-PROGRESS] nestjs-rivulex is a NestJS transport layer and wrapper for Rivulex, a lightweight message broker using Redis Streams. It ensures reliable, at-least-once message delivery within NestJS applications.

items.content_html: [IN-PROGRESS] Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.
items.title: raw-leak/rivulex: [IN-PROGRESS] Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient message broker library written in pure JavaScript. It ensures at-least-once delivery guarantees over Redis Streams.
